ReportUnlawfulContent.content: You can also <link>report content you believe is unlawful</link> in your country without logging in.

upsideContent.title: Sign up to see photos and videos from your friends.

bottomContent.contactInformation: People who use our service may have uploaded your contact information to Instagram. <link>Learn More</link>
bottomContent.termsAndPolicy: By signing up, you agree to our <terms>Terms</terms>. Learn how we collect, use and share your data in our <privacyPolicy>Privacy Policy</privacyPolicy> and how we use cookies and similar technology in our <cookiesPolicy>Cookies Policy</cookiesPolicy>.

birthday.title: Add Your Birthday
birthday.content: This won't be a part of your public profile.
birthday.useOwnBirthday: Use your own birthday, even if this account is for a business, a pet, or something else

confirmation-code.title: Enter Confirmation Code
confirmation-code.content: Enter the confirmation code we sent to {email}. <resend-code>Resend Code</resend-code>.

sign-up.email: Another account is using the same email.
sign-up.username: Another account is using the same username.

common.unexpected: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
